FK.content: technical, automatic, machine-like [the possibility of faith, its very chance], a chance that entails risk of radical evil, otherwise it would simply be pure know-how, pure knowledge, annulment of future, programme, proof, predictability, providence
FK.linkedContent: technical, automatic, machine-like [the possibility of faith, its very chance], a chance that entails risk of radical evil, otherwise it would simply be pure know-how, pure knowledge, annulment of future, programme, proof, predictability, providence

FK.content: growing disproportion btwn knowledge &. know-how (use of artifacts/protheses of which one is totally ignorant)
FK.linkedContent: growing disproportion btwn knowledge &. know-how (use of artifacts/protheses of which one is totally ignorant)

OH.content: following program—application of know-how > ethics & politics become a technology, no longer order of practical reason or decision, begins to be irresponsible
OH.linkedContent: following program—application of know-how > ethics & politics become a technology, no longer order of practical reason or decision, begins to be irresponsible

PIO.content: grasp unity of 2 measures of invention: 1) fabula/fictio: art 2) tekhnē, epistemē, istoria, methodos, art, know-how, procedure, knowledge, research
PIO.linkedContent: grasp unity of 2 measures of invention: 1) fabula/fictio: art 2) tekhnē, epistemē, istoria, methodos, art, know-how, procedure, knowledge, research

HST.content: Levinas: tools suppress intermediary times, contract duration, machines sum up instants, produce speed, echo impatience of desire [modern tools are machines]
HST.linkedContent: Levinas: tools suppress intermediary times, contract duration, machines sum up instants, produce speed, echo impatience of desire [modern tools are machines]

E.content: for Kant, art is a power, aptitude, property, destiny of man (Geschicklichkeit des Menschen), and is distinguished from science (where to know is to know how to do, to be able to)
E.linkedContent: for Kant, art is a power, aptitude, property, destiny of man (Geschicklichkeit des Menschen), and is distinguished from science (where to know is to know how to do, to be able to)

BSi.content: fable, for, fari, to speak, to say, fabula, something said > make so as to know: 1) bring knowledge to the other 2) give impression, effect, of knowledge, of knowing, simulacrum of knowing: a savoir-faire to “faire” savoir where there is no knowing worthy of the name
BSi.linkedContent: fable, for, fari, to speak, to say, fabula, something said > make so as to know: 1) bring knowledge to the other 2) give impression, effect, of knowledge, of knowing, simulacrum of knowing: a savoir-faire to “faire” savoir where there is no knowing worthy of the name

BSi.content: events of 9/11: know-how of archive, technical reproducibility part of event (political-economy/power of media) > knowing how to cause fear, making known: virtuality of the worst
BSi.linkedContent: events of 9/11: know-how of archive, technical reproducibility part of event (political-economy/power of media) > knowing how to cause fear, making known: virtuality of the worst

BSi.content: no capital w/out accredited fable > w/ real effects [logic of market part of logic of war]
BSi.linkedContent: no capital w/out accredited fable > w/ real effects [logic of market part of logic of war]

BSi.content: know-how of fox, cunning, know-how to trick, perjure, dissimulate, not make known; p. 90 le savoir-faire sans faire-savoir (know-how w/out making known)
BSi.linkedContent: know-how of fox, cunning, know-how to trick, perjure, dissimulate, not make known; p. 90 le savoir-faire sans faire-savoir (know-how w/out making known)

EU.content: Kant’s architectonics (of Reason) as internal principle, organic whole or organic purposiveness (finalité), one sets out from a purpose (on part de la fin), as in every organic totality > organic “metaphor” in Critique of Pure Reason presages the 3rd Critique
EU.linkedContent: Kant’s architectonics (of Reason) as internal principle, organic whole or organic purposiveness (finalité), one sets out from a purpose (on part de la fin), as in every organic totality > organic “metaphor” in Critique of Pure Reason presages the 3rd Critique

EU.content: if one does not set out from architectonic principle, one only achieves “technical” unity, “know-how”
EU.linkedContent: if one does not set out from architectonic principle, one only achieves “technical” unity, “know-how”

EU.content: calling for competences that aren’t only theoretical: a know-how, the capacity for performance, that avoids classical institutional calculation > CIPH will encourage “research training,” develop technical competence (database, telematics, “artificial intelligence”) & a new kind of “philosophical” reflection [baby daddy]
EU.linkedContent: calling for competences that aren’t only theoretical: a know-how, the capacity for performance, that avoids classical institutional calculation > CIPH will encourage “research training,” develop technical competence (database, telematics, “artificial intelligence”) & a new kind of “philosophical” reflection [baby daddy]
